DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
While in human form, you have +1 retain.
While in spirit form, you have +2 strength and +2 dexterity, but your attacks are targeted randomly.
When you use a potion, brew a random potion. Expires at the end of your turn.
Payment required to gain the favor.
A reward bestowed at a price.
